title: 大家帮帮忙
author: yudexi
txt_content:
$~FAQX4P)00S~8O(}NHEFWR.jpg (81.86 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2015-1-25 18:36 上传




自己开的服启动好了怎么看服务器IP多少

replies.txt_content: 打开服务器文件 server.po好像 然后看看里面有条server-ip:
如果你是用蛤蟆吃开的,就用蛤蟆吃的ip
如果你是用花生壳开的，就用花生壳提示的ip

replies.author: 龙玉涛
replies.txt_content:
#Minecraft server properties
#Sun Jan 25 15:25:35 CST 2015
generator-settings=

allow-nether=true

force-gamemode=false

spawn-npcs=true

gamemode=0
player-idle-timeout=0

spawn-monsters=true
generate-structures=true
view-distance=10
spawn-protection=16
motd=A Minecraft Server

replies.author: 龙玉涛
replies.txt_content: 打开服务端里的server.properties就可以

replies.author: 龙玉涛
replies.txt_content:
server-ip=
后面可以设置成你的IP
反正我没有试过
